thread.title: Taylor Swift lip syncs to her song with |
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift lip syncs to her song with Gigi Hadid | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Jones For Dailymail.com
title: Taylor Swift lip syncs to her song with |
text:
Taylor Swift 's new hit I Don't Wanna Live Forever was released nearly two months ago.
But the 27-year-old pop star heard it for the first time while riding around town with BFF Gigi Hadid - who is currently dating Zayn Malik , the other artist featured on the Fifty Shades Darker soundtrack listing.
'First time listening to it on the radio, I've never heard it before,' Swift stated in a recording she posted to her YouTube channel on Wednesday.
Scroll down for video
'I've never heard it before': Taylor Swift's new hit I Don't Wanna Live Forever was released nearly two months ago but on Wednesday she heard it for the first time on the radio
The Shake It Off songstress started lip syncing to the single as the 21-year-old supermodel joined in and danced along.
Taylor donned a black coat as she sang into her hand like a microphone, saying: 'I'm going to do a dramatic entry.'
She looked stunning as ever while breaking into her lyrics, 'I'm sitting eyes wide open and I got one thing stuck in my mind... Wondering if I dodged a bullet or just lost the love of my life.
Car karaoke: The 27-year-old pop star was riding around town with gal pal Gigi Hadid when she started lip syncing the hit
'Baby, baby, I feel crazy... Up all night, all night and every day... I gave you something, but you gave me nothing. What is happening to me?'
The Grammy winner cracked a smile for the camera before she stopped recording.
She sported a blonde bob with blunt bangs and a bold crimson lip with thin black cat eyeliner for the short video.
Jam session: The A-list ladies rocked out in the back of a blacked out SUV as the song played in the background
Low-key look: The Victoria's Secret model wore a black coat with fuzzy trim and kept concealed behind dark round-framed shades
Gigi - whose relationship with the former One Direction member was confirmed in December 2015 - kept concealed behind dark round-framed shades.
Her signature blonde locks were swept back and she appeared to be wearing minimal make-up, revealing her natural beauty and flawless complexion.
A black puffer coat with fuzzy trim layered over the Victoria's Secret model's low-cut beige printed blouse.
The A-list ladies rocked out in the back of a blacked out SUV as the song played in the background.
Sexy single! The music video for I Don't Wanna Live Forever was released last week
Young love: Gigi - whose relationship with Zayn Malik was confirmed in December 2015 - is featured on the single included on the Fifty Shades Darker soundtrack
